overview: A psychotherapist, who left with a group of seven patients in a chalet in the mountains as part of a group therapy, accidentally falls down and has to go home for treatment. However, he decides to call a colleague to replace him, so as not to abandon his patients. Emma therefore takes over, and must deal with the often confusing troubles of each other, while trying to keep intact the number one rule, namely not having sex between patients ...
title: Therapix at Christmas
